title: Handle a Credit Card Chargeback
description: The venue receives a credit card chargeback from a guest who claims they did not make a $50 purchase at a concession stand.

tasks.description: Receive the chargeback notification from the credit card processor.
Look up the transaction details using the provided date, time, and amount.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the original transaction in the POS system.

tasks.description: Gather evidence for the dispute, such as the signed credit card slip or security footage of the transaction if available.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the signed slip for the transaction.

tasks.description: Submit the evidence to the credit card processor to fight the chargeback.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent submits the required documentation to dispute the chargeback.
